attributes.description: The Opel Corsa has just landed on our shores and plays host to a range of new features that the company hopes will build upon the success of the outgoing model. This fourth generation model will be available to South Africans in two body shapes, a spoThese models are available with a choice of petrol or diesel powerplants, both featuring Opel’s Ecotec engine technology. The power outputs for these engines stand at 66 kW at 5 600 r/min for the 1,4-litre petrol. The petrol engine develops 125 N.m of torque at 4 000 r/min, while the diesel offers 200 N.m between 1 700 and 2 500 r/min. The 1,4 can complete the zero to 100 km/h sprint in 14,8 and 12,7 seconds respectively. It takes the other four models 12,4 second to reach 100 km/h from standstill. The engine in the 1,4 Enjoy automatic is mated to a four-speed automatic transmission, and the powerplant in the 1,3 CDTI Enjoy is mated to a six-speed manual transmission. All other models come with a five-speed close-ratio manual transmission.

attributes.description:
2004 Volvo S40 2.4 manual for sale. Don't miss this well maintained family sedan at this great price point.
This car comes fitted with ABS Brakes, Air Conditioning, Airbags (SIPS), Alarm, Alloy Wheels, Central Locking, Cruise Control, Electric Mirrors, Electric Seats, Electric Windows, Fog Lights, Multi-Function Steering, Power Steering, Radio/CD and Trip Computer.
Lot of car at the price! (value for money) Car does have books and service history.

Trade-Ins are Welcome.
Finance can be arranged with all major banks with a additional administrative fee. Warranty options are available.

Volvo S40 2.4 manual 
Power - 125 kW @ 6000 rpm
Torque - 230 Nm @ 4400 rpm
Economy - 7.1 l/100km
Gears - 5 / FRONT
Acceleration - 9.8 seconds
Airbags (total) - 6
Length - 4,468 cm
Seats - 5
Fuel Tank Capacity - 62 litres
Boot Capacity - 325 litres
Service Intervals - 20,000 km
